properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father we adore you
Bow down and we worship you
Father we adore you
Bow down and we worship you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Alleluia - Alleluia - Alleluia
We love you Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus we adore you
Bow down and we worship you
Jesus we adore you
Bow down and we worship you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Allelia - Alleluia - Alleluia
We love you Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Spirit we adore you
Bow down and we worship you
Spirit we adore you
Bow down and we worship you
